question.title: What is the primary cause of syncope in adults?

option_a.title: Reflex syncope
option_a.description: A type of syncope caused by a sudden decrease in blood pressure

option_b.title: Cardiac syncope
option_b.description: A type of syncope caused by a heart condition

option_c.title: Hypotensive syncope
option_c.description: A type of syncope caused by a sudden drop in blood pressure

option_d.title: Neurological syncope
option_d.description: A type of syncope caused by a neurological condition

correct_option.title: A
correct_option.description: The letter of the correct answer
